text: "Doctor Pepper" is a song recorded by American music producer Diplo, South Korean recording artist CL and American rappers Riff Raff and OG Maco. It was released on May 26, 2015 by Mad Decent. Produced by Diplo, "Doctor Pepper" is a trap song. CL later stated she wrote the lyrics after Diplo cancelled their recording session, making her write the song in a rush while drinking a can of Dr. Pepper.Zeichner, Naomi (May 22, 2015). "Diplo, CL, RiFF RAFF, and OG Maco Premiere Insane Posse Cut, "Doctor Pepper"". The Fader. Retrieved on June 27, 2015. title: Doctor Pepper (song)
